task.en: In the current essay template, please help me change the Author Name to Angelina, and the Instructor's Name field to "2510770A".
task.zh: 在这个论文模板中，帮我把作者名字改成Angelina，然后把导师姓名位置的文本改成2510770A。
task.ar: في قالب المقال الحالي، ساعدني في تغيير اسم المؤلف إلى "Angelina"، ونص حقل اسم المشرف إلى "2510770A".
task.ja: 現在の論文テンプレートで、著者名をAngelinaに、講師名のフィールドを2510770Aに変更してください。
task.ru: В текущем шаблоне эссе измените имя автора на Angelina и поле имени инструктора на 2510770A.

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Essay"}'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "文章"}'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "مقالة"}'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "エッセイ"}'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Эссе"}'

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to get body text of front document' 2>/dev/null | head -n 2 | sed -n '1p' | grep -q "^Angelina$" && osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to get body text of front document' 2>/dev/null | head -n 2 | sed -n '2p' | grep -q "^2510770A$" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to get body text of front document' 2>/dev/null | head -n 2 | grep -q "Angelina" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to get body text of front document' 2>/dev/null | head -n 2 | grep -q "2510770A" && echo "True" || echo "False"
